title: First Angular app lesson 3 - Create the application’s HousingLocation component

第一個 Angular 應用程式：第 3 課 - 建立應用程式的 HousingLocation 元件link

First Angular app lesson 3 - Create the application’s HousingLocation componentlink

本課程示範瞭如何將 HousingLocation 元件新增到 Angular 應用程式中。

This tutorial lesson demonstrates how to add the HousingLocation component to your Angular app.

所需時間： 完成這節課預計需要 10 分鐘左右。

Time required: expect to spend about 10 minutes to complete this lesson.

開始之前link

Before you startlink

這節課以上一課的程式碼為起點，你可以：

This lesson starts with the code from the previous lesson, so you can:

  • 在整合開發環境（IDE）中使用你在第 2 課中建立的程式碼。

    Use the code that you created in Lesson 2 in your integrated development environment (IDE).

  • 從上一課的程式碼範例開始。選擇，以便：

    Start with the code example from the previous lesson. Choose the from Lesson 1 where you can:

    • 使用 StackBlitz 中的線上例子，其中 StackBlitz 介面就是你的 IDE。

      Use the live example in StackBlitz, where the StackBlitz interface is your IDE.

    • 使用下載範例並在你的 IDE 中開啟它。

      Use the download example and open it in your IDE.

如果你還沒看過簡介，請存取 Angular 課程簡介以確保你已具備完成這節課所需的一切知識。

If you haven't reviewed the introduction, visit the Introduction to Angular tutorial to make sure you have everything you need to complete this lesson.

如果你在這節課中遇到任何問題，可以檢視這節課的完整程式碼，參見。

If you have any trouble during this lesson, you can review the completed code for this lesson, in the for this lesson.

完成之後link

After you finishlink

  • 應用程式有一個新元件：HousingLocationComponent，它會顯示一條訊息，以確認該元件成功新增到了應用程式中。

    Your app has a new component: HousingLocationComponent and it displays a message confirming that the component was added to your application.

課程步驟link

Lesson stepslink

在 IDE 中對應用程式程式碼執行下列步驟。

Perform these steps on the app code in your IDE.

第 1 步 - 建立 HousingLocationComponentlink

Step 1 - Create the HousingLocationComponentlink

在此步驟中，你將為應用程式建立一個新元件。

In this step, you create a new component for your app.

在 IDE 的終端窗格中：

In the Terminal pane of your IDE:

  1. 執行此命令以建立一個新的 HousingLocationComponent

    Run this command to create a new HousingLocationComponent

    ng generate component HousingLocation --standalone --inline-template --skip-tests

  2. 執行此命令以建構並啟動應用開發伺服器。

    Run this command to build and serve your app.

    ng serve

  3. 開啟瀏覽器並導航到 http://localhost:4200 以找到該應用程式。

    Open a browser and navigate to http://localhost:4200 to find the application.

  4. 確認應用建構時沒有錯誤。

    Confirm that the app builds without error.

    注意：它應該渲染出與上一課相同的效果，因為即使你添加了一個新元件，但還沒有把它包含在應用程式的任何範本中。

    Note: It should render the same as it did in the previous lesson because even though you added a new component, you haven't included it in any of the app's templates, yet.

  5. 在完成後續步驟時讓 ng serve 保持執行。

    Leave ng serve running as you complete the next steps.

第 2 步 - 將新元件新增到應用的佈局中link

Step 2 - Add the new component to your app's layoutlink

在此步驟中，你將新元件 HousingLocationComponent 新增到應用的 HomeComponent 中，以便讓它顯示在應用的佈局中。

In this step, you add the new component, HousingLocationComponent to your app's HomeComponent, so that it displays in your app's layout.

在 IDE 的編輯窗格中：

In the Edit pane of your IDE:

  1. 在編輯器中開啟 home.component.ts。

    Open home.component.ts in the editor.

  2. 在 home.component.ts 中，透過將此行新增到檔案頂部來匯入 HousingLocationComponent。

    In home.component.ts, import HousingLocationComponent by adding this line to the file level imports.

    import { HousingLocationComponent } from '../housing-location/housing-location.component';

  3. 接下來將 HousingLocationComponent 新增到 @Component 元資料的 imports 陣列中。

    Next update the imports property of the @Component metadata by adding HousingLocationComponent to the array.

    imports: [ CommonModule, HousingLocationComponent ],

  4. 現在該元件已準備好在 HomeComponent 的範本中使用了。更新 @Component 元資料的 template 屬性，以便包含對 <app-housing-location> 標記的參考。

    Now the component is ready for use in the template for the HomeComponent. Update the template property of the @Component metadata to include a reference to the <app-housing-location> tag.

    template: ` <section> <form> <input type="text" placeholder="Filter by city"> <button class="primary" type="button">Search</button> </form> </section> <section class="results"> <app-housing-location></app-housing-location> </section> `,

第 3 步 - 為元件新增樣式link

Step 3 - Add the styles for the componentlink

在此步驟中，你會將 HousingLocationComponent 的預寫樣式複製到應用程式中，以便應用程式能正確渲染。

In this step, you will copy over the pre-written styles for the HousingLocationComponent to your app so that the app renders properly.

  1. 開啟 src/app/housing-location/housing-location.css，並將以下樣式貼上到檔案中：

    Open src/app/housing-location/housing-location.css, and paste the styles below into the file:

    .listing { background: var(--accent-color); border-radius: 30px; padding-bottom: 30px; } .listing-heading { color: var(--primary-color); padding: 10px 20px 0 20px; } .listing-photo { height: 250px; width: 100%; object-fit: cover; border-radius: 30px 30px 0 0; } .listing-location { padding: 10px 20px 20px 20px; } .listing-location::before { content: url("/assets/location-pin.svg") / ""; } section.listing a { padding-left: 20px; text-decoration: none; color: var(--primary-color); } section.listing a::after { content: "\203A"; margin-left: 5px; }

  2. 儲存你的程式碼，返回瀏覽器並確認應用程式建構沒有錯誤。你應該看到螢幕上渲染出了訊息 “housing-location works!”。在繼續下一步之前更正所有錯誤。

    Save your code, return to the browser and confirm that the app builds without error. You should find the message "housing-location works!" rendered to the screen.Correct any errors before you continue to the next step.
